org.forgerock.openam.sts.rest.operation.translate

Interface TokenTransform<I,O extends TokenTypeId>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TokenTransformImpl

    public interface TokenTransform<I,O extends TokenTypeId>
    This interface defines a specific token transformation. A set of TokenTransform instance will be injected into each REST-STS instance, one for each supported token translation. Token transformation and token translation can be considered synonyms - different names were chosen to distinguish the top-level operation(TokenTransformOperation), and the set of specific TokenTransform instances, each of which validates a specific input token type and generates a specific output token type. Instances of this interface will be maintained in a Set in the TokenTranslateOperation, so their equals and hashCode methods must be overridden correctly.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isTransformSupported(TokenTypeId inputTokenType, TokenTypeId outputTokenType)
      The TokenTranslateOperationImpl maintains a set of these instances, one corresponding to each of the supported token transforms.
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue transformToken(RestTokenTransformValidatorParameters<I> validatorParameters, RestTokenProviderParameters<O> providerParameters)
      transforms the input token type specified in the RestTokenTransformValidatorParameters into the output token specified by the RestTokenProviderParameters

    • Method Detail

      • isTransformSupported

        boolean isTransformSupported(TokenTypeId inputTokenType,
                             TokenTypeId outputTokenType)
        The TokenTranslateOperationImpl maintains a set of these instances, one corresponding to each of the supported token transforms. When a token translation invocation arrives, this method is used on the Set<TokenTransform> to determine which instance to invoke to realize the token transformation.
        Parameters:
        inputTokenType - the input token type in the token transformation
        outputTokenType - the output token type in the token transformation
        Returns:
        whether or not this particular TokenTransform instance can support the specified translation

      • transformToken

        org.forgerock.json.JsonValue transformToken(RestTokenTransformValidatorParameters<I> validatorParameters,
                                            RestTokenProviderParameters<O> providerParameters)
                                     throws TokenValidationException,
                                            TokenCreationException
        transforms the input token type specified in the RestTokenTransformValidatorParameters into the output token specified by the RestTokenProviderParameters
        Parameters:
        validatorParameters - the state necessary to perform token validation
        providerParameters - the state necessary to generate the output token
        Returns:
        the json representation of the generated token
        Throws:
        TokenValidationException - if the input token could not be validated
        TokenCreationException - if the output token could not be generated
